Villa Savoye, Le Corbusier, Poissy, France: 1928
Villa Stein - de Monzie, Le Corbusier, Garches, France: 1927
Site Plan, Ludwig Mies van der Rohe, Stuttgart, Germany, Weissenhof Settlement: 1927
Horseshoe Settlement, Bruno Taut, Berlin-Britz, Germany: (1925 - 1927)
Settlement, Walter Gropius, Dessau-Törten, Germany: (1926 - 1928)
Dymaxion House, Buckminster Fuller, Project: 1930
Maison de Verre, Pierre Chareau, Paris, France: (1928 - 1932)
Casa del Fascio, Giuseppe Terragni, Como, Italy: (1932 - 1936)
Palazzo della Civiltà Italiana, Guerrini, La Padula, and Romano, Rome, Italy: (1938 - 1943)
Zeppelinfeld, Albert Speer, Nuremberg, Germany: 1936
McMillan Plan, Senate Park Commission, Washington, D.C.: 1902
Lincoln Memorial, Henry Bacon, Washington, D.C.: (1914 - 1922)
Jefferson Memorial, John Russell Pope, Washington, D.C.: (1939 - 1943)
Chicago Tribune Competition, Walter Gropius, Project: 1922
Chicago Tribune Competition, Eliel Saarinen, Project: 1922
Chicago Tribune Building, John Mead Howells and Raymond Hood, Chicago, IL: (1924 - 1928)
Chrysler Building, William Van Alen, New York, NY: (1928 - 1930)
PSFS Building, Howe and Lescaze, Philadelphia, PA: 1932
Ennis House, Frank Lloyd Wright, Los Angeles, CA: 1923
Kaufmann House (Fallingwater), Frank Lloyd Wright, Bear Run, PA: (1936 - 1939)
Johnson Wax Company Administration Building, Frank Lloyd Wright, Racine, WI: (1936 - 1939)
Lovell Health House, Richard Neutra, Los Angeles, CA: (1927 - 1929)
Lovell Beach House, Rudolf Schindler, Newport Beach, CA: 1926
Illinois Institute of Technology, Ludwig Mies van der Rohe, Chicago, IL: 1956
Farnsworth House, Ludwig Mies van der Rohe, Plano, IL: (1945 - 1951)
Glass House, Philip Johnson, New Canaan, CT: 1949
Lever Brothers Building, Natalie Griffin de Blois with Gordon Bunshaft at Skidmore, Owings and Merrill (SOM), New York, NY: 1952
Lake Shore Drive Apartments, Ludwig Mies van der Rohe, Chicago, IL: (1949 - 1951)
Seagram Building, Ludwig Mies van der Rohe, New York City, NY: (1956 - 1958)
